about.title: A dedicated Full-Stack Developer from Kohat Pakistan
about.text: I love to solve problems and build web applications. I'm passionate about Full-Stack development. I have a good understanding in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Vue js, PHP, Laravel and Wordpress. My main goal is creating smooth, interctive, & user friendly interface using best development tools & language.
